features: connect your portable keyboard and mouse to one USB receiver(The Nano receiver just snap in the storage of keyboard near battery compartment.
Keyboard mouse noise reduced keys and the silent click of the quiet mouse will allow you to do your job without disturbing anyone.

The wireless keyboard mouse set is specially designed for office. Our keys structure has been redesigned with low noise processing, it can provide an ultra silent experience without any annoying keystroke noise.
The keyboard with numeric keypad and 12 multi-media hot keys instant access your music, internet, volume etc. (The hot-keys not fully compatible with Mac OS),
The keyboard and mouse combo includes a full-size keyboard and a high sensitivity mouse.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.6 3.6 out of 5 stars 1,321 ratings 3.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 2 in 1 USB Receiver Plug and play, no need to download any software. One 2.4GHz USB receiver can connect both the wireless keyboard and mouse. 3 adjustable DPI with DPI switch on the top of the mouse makes it easy to change mouse sensitivity when gaming or whatever. The USB Receiver is inserted on the battery compartment of the keyboard. Full-Size Wireless Keyboard Compact wireless Keyboard, keyboard provide reliable and precise convey, you don't worry about miss letter or drop out. 2.4GHz wireless signal boasts a range of 33 ft,just plug the receiver into any USB port and it quickly establishes a solid (up to 10m) connection with the keyboard and mouse.

Both Keyboard and Mouse Full size 104 keys keyboard and the precise mouse, now you can totally handle any task at home/office. Enjoy its great convenience and improve your work efficiency with this amazing wireless keyboard and mouse combo. Just use one tiny nano receiver to wireless connect both keyboard and mouse to your computer,eliminating the hassle of multiple receivers, provides reliable wireless range of 10m.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The item appears significantly smaller in person, yet it perfectly fits the size requirement I had. I opted for the black variant to ensure it complements my black-and-white workspace. Additionally, it is incredibly adorable and lightweight. Although it may be slightly fragile, it will undoubtedly fulfill its purpose without a doubt. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, I am just getting around to using this, as I purchased it to hook up to my PS5 and then didn’t play the game I needed it for until now, so I can’t return.Anyway, the keyboard didn’t work at all. I thought maybe it was the battery compartment since I’ve had that happen in the past with electronics, so I folded up a piece of foil and stuck it between the battery and the metal piece it touches.. And we have power! Well, sometimes… it goes in and out. The power light also doesn’t come on even when it’s on and working.The keyboard is super light and feels very cheap, but it’s ok for my intended use, if only it stayed working! CThe mouse…. The mouse is just terrible. I don’t know how anyone can use it. Also super light and feels very cheap. It doesn’t have the same click like a normal mouse and it’s so flat that it doesn’t feel like you’re holding on to anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Slightly Adequate
reviews.reviewText: Item purchased then exchanged due to mouse not working (red light sensor working but no mouse on screen). Easy set up for my Gateway brand laptop. No special installation needed. Keyboard and mouse are both lightweight and easy to handle. Not sure how the battery life will be. Both devices require two AA batteries. However, unlike other wireless setups I have used in the past, neither have an off/on switch. I am assuming they go to sleep when the computer/laptop is off. No issues so far with the replacement product that was sent. Keystrokes are not as quiet as expected but not loud and heavy either. Not bad for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and lightweight , nice design
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this keyboard and mouse set for my son to use on his tablet so he could stop taking the one from my living room computer. I didn't want to spend too much as he only uses it for his homework, and I was truly surprised that they work so well and such a reasonable price. The keys are nice and soft.the mouse is really light weight and quiet. no noisy clicking. He calls it satisfying! We Especially love its compact design. Gives him so much more room on his desk to do schoolwork.Like that the keyboard is somewhat propped up for comfort too- they though of everythingWhen he's not using it he can store it away easily out of site in his desk, and it fits perfectly it's a great size and design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It light weight and functional but seem cheaply made. The keys aren’t silent but rather loud. I use it just to get me by but I wouldn’t recommend it to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for.
reviews.reviewText: The keyboard is very lightweight which is great. However, I’ve used it for 3 days and the keys are already getting stuck. The mouse is even lighter. I’ve gotten one just like it at five below and it was the same quality, cheap. Very light weight. The scroll will jam and freeze up and not even scroll the direction you’re scrolling. It’s going back. The color is cute but other than that it’s not super reliable for functional needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, not for me.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great keyboard/mouse combo for a great price. It seems very sturdy looks good.I am pretty old school in my computer usage (I remember ms-DOS fondly.) I find it more efficient to use the keyboard for many of the functions that most people younger than I do with the mouse. As such, I decided I needed to spend another $5 to get dedicated HOME, Pgup, Pgdn and shortcut menu keys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this keyboard and mouse set. Not noisy. Small yet big enough to type with precision. The mouse is light. Super cute color. Great additions to my laptop.
